core:process.core:comment: Voids a Payment Service Tender item, reversing the authorisation. Checks user authorisation and captures reason code (unless part of a transaction void).

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Skip authorisation check and reason prompt if voiding as a child item or as part of a transaction void.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Prepare request and invoke DoVoid service. Used after an authorisation has been obtained.
